snippet: KLAIBER--Robert, husband of Diane, father of James, Jeanne, and Karen (Hersch), "Opa" to Abigail, Sophie, and Olivia, died February 25, 2016 on Cape Cod. At AT&T Bell Labs, Bob was instrumental in developing optical fiber manufacturing technology. His family and friends continue to share the fruits of his love of the arts. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KLAIBER--Robert, husband of Diane, father of James, Jeanne, and Karen (Hersch), "Opa" to Abigail, Sophie, and Olivia, died February 25, 2016 on Cape Cod. At AT&T Bell Labs, Bob was instrumental in developing optical fiber manufacturing technology. His family and friends continue to share the fruits of his love of the arts. 1/3
